waifu_tool_fa_comment.2: How are you today? Please, be careful.

waifu_tool_fa_comment.7: Your loved one is thinking about you, give time to your happiness.
waifu_tool_fa_comment.8: Do not give up, you can do it! I believe in you!
waifu_tool_fa_comment.9: Many people would rather deny the fact, than face the truth.
waifu_tool_fa_comment.10: The mountains are filled with soil, and the sea is filled with water.
waifu_tool_fa_comment.11: Love is like holding a torch against the wind, there is always the risk of burning your hands.
waifu_tool_fa_comment.12: Innocence and pure light, the sun breaks the darkness, it can contain disasters, wind, fire, and illuminate the world.
waifu_tool_fa_comment.13: Maybe we have not grown up, but the world has become smaller.

waifu.7: 这样的话，只能使用武力了！

waifu_tool_fa_comment.2: 你今天好吗？ 请注意
waifu_tool_fa_comment.3: 古之立大事者，不惟有超世之才，亦必有坚忍不拔之志。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.4: 师父，我该如何为您服务？
waifu_tool_fa_comment.5: 给岁月以文明，而不是给文明以岁月。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.6: 要了解您的敌人，您必须成为您的敌人。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.7: 您所爱的人在想着您，付出时间并开心。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.8: 不要放弃，你可以做到！ 我相信你！
waifu_tool_fa_comment.9: 许多人宁愿否认事实，也不愿面对现实。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.10: 积土而为山，积水而为海。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.11: 爱欲于人，犹如执炬，逆风而行，必有烧手之患。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.12: 无垢清净光，慧日破诸暗，能伏灾风火，普明照世间。
waifu_tool_fa_comment.13: 也许我们都没有长大，只是世界变小了。
